description: [``botocore``] Aws CodeBuild now supports new compute type BUILD_GENERAL1_XLARGE
[``botocore``] Amazon EC2 R7iz bare metal instances are powered by custom 4th generation Intel Xeon Scalable processors.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for query type configuration on firewall rules that enables customers for granular action (ALLOW, ALERT, BLOCK) by DNS query type.
